html:
1.25.20  11:33 am   why are there dripping noises outside my window?

     this may not be what you want to hear, but that's water

1.25.20  11:24 am   Why is the universe the way it is?

     can you even think of another way for it to be

1.25.20  10:58 am   why is love not fruit and bread?

     process of elimination

1.25.20  10:56 am   what dimensions do you live in?

     regular

1.25.20  10:50 am   why were you up at 4 30 am answering questions  

     i have answered questions hundreds, thousands of times here. it is inevitable that some of those times would be 4:30 am. but you would have no way of knowing which times that was

1.25.20  10:08 am   How is you music so vibeing?

     my great ancestor was a vibe

1.25.20  10:05 am   where are we in the universe?

     right here

1.25.20  9:50 am   What is your set up like

     not as crazy as it could be

1.25.20  9:46 am   What is your favorite fruit?

     the sunrise

1.25.20  9:45 am   When is your next video

     i am having a count down timer

1.25.20  9:36 am   when you talk about writing sessions does that usually mean sitting down and playing something to think of a melody, or putting something to a melody, or just whatever you think needs writing

     construction of music recordings and videos is very intricate, and it's like building a house. This is not the part i refer to as the writing. the writing process i am referring to is entirely before any piece of contruction matierial is touced. before any of the actual audio recording / video contents are actually created. i must know how the song/video goes, completely. every word, every melody note, and every important chord. and the exact tempo, and the exact sequence, and the exact road map all the way until the end. and therefore as a by product of that i therefore also know almost exactly how long it will play. This still leaves room for tremendous amounts of detail. All the details really. the writing process is getting everything EXCEPT the details. That's because when you are constructing the house, (or making the recording, or creating the video graphics), there are SO MANY things to take care of and worry about, just in terms of what materials you use, what details to put, besically that's when the paint actually hits. There are so many things to deal with and worry about there, i have found out that you CAN NOT be unsure of *how the song goes*

1.25.20  9:10 am   is bill wurtz secretly Steve 

     i hadn't considered that, but now that you mention it it seems to become alarmingly likely

1.25.20  8:49 am   When is the countdown timer going to finish?

     right away. it's an emergency. i am about to lose the backing i have from all major celebrities

1.25.20  8:46 am   are you still riding a pony into the sunset?

     i may do that every so often and again

1.25.20  8:35 am   who's gonna win the oscars this year?

     parasite

1.25.20  8:11 am   what did you learn today?

     how and how not to animate arms

1.25.20  7:44 am   When will you make a new videos ? 

     extremely right away. i am working on videos right now but i can't show them to you because those are for learning purposes only. still am stupid. what i am doing is like learning to tame a swarm of bees. hold on, i almost have them tamed

1.25.20  7:17 am   Why does existence exist?

     because you said

1.25.20  6:45 am   do you think of making music more as a job, or as a creative outlet?

     extremely both

1.25.20  6:32 am   what when why, and how?

     i will be discussing those details shortly

1.25.20  5:36 am   Where can i buy those sponsored chips?

     at the store

1.25.20  5:28 am   Do you like Brazil?

     it's pretty good

1.25.20  5:23 am   I've noticed that a lot of your songs are very similar, in that they usually seem to say something about having to leave home and go somewhere new. Is that on purpose or just a coincidence?

     coincidence

     Also, sorry if someone already asked this

1.25.20  5:21 am   I've been told I'm too quiet. How do I be more assertive?

     first you are going to need to find things you would like to assert

1.25.20  4:21 am   i'm going to cracker barrel do you want me to get you something?

     this may be a tall order but can you get me the barrel

1.25.20  3:26 am   which of your videos do you like the most

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.25.20  2:43 am   What's the ACTUAL meaning of life?

     it's you

1.25.20  2:32 am   If you start recording a song, and then find major aspects that you don't enjoy like about the song, are you more likely to scrap the project or try to improve it?

     must fix

1.25.20  2:15 am   Bill, you're awesome, what's up?

     oh i was just being normal

1.25.20  1:46 am   What's your dream movie role?

     movie star

1.25.20  1:33 am   do you record lyrics off the top of your head

     yes, or the middle. make sure to include music as well

1.25.20  12:57 am   Yo pal. Love your stuff amd wondering hows the countdown timer feeling.

     patient, and steady

     It'll get there when its get there. Its having a good day?

     i guess

1.25.20  12:29 am   how is the middle of the sun this time of year

     too hot but it's where i need to be right now

1.24.20  11:37 pm   I've been inside alot lately, what's the outside like?

     so beautiful

1.24.20  11:23 pm   what's the best use for a nickel?

     stand it up on its side

1.24.20  11:03 pm   Of all the songs you've made what's ur favorite

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.24.20  11:01 pm   what is 'steve's' real name

     i am beginning to think it is steve

1.24.20  10:50 pm   How do I unthink something?

     you have to think at least 2 other things

1.24.20  10:36 pm   have you recently gone outside to look at the stars and breathe in the wonderment that is the night?

     yes i did, even though i was not planning to

1.24.20  10:28 pm   Are you a dog person or a cat person?

     human

1.24.20  10:13 pm   What's the deepest hole you remember digging?

     still digging it

1.24.20  9:31 pm   so what's the deal with the software thing? i've heard about it, but i'm curious as to the backstory

     we stand on the shoulders of giants

1.24.20  9:23 pm   when is the right time to speak in public?

     00 midnight UTC

1.24.20  9:10 pm   What's the best way to spend a Saturday morning in your opinion?

     in the road

1.24.20  8:58 pm   What's the countdown timer at 

     26

1.24.20  8:38 pm   I am a railroad photographer from Upstate NY. The daily Buffalo-to-Albany CSX freight train had only 124 freight cars and 1 locomotive today (usually this train has 145 cars and 2 locomotives.) I ask you, Bill, why the change?

     thank you for checking with me, the reason is because they discovered that 19 of the cars were empty, and the rest of them were filled with feathers

1.24.20  8:12 pm   What really brightens your day?

     the night, being darker by comparison

1.24.20  7:26 pm   Are you too small for the mall?

     what the heck is a mall

1.24.20  7:18 pm   what's your favorite video you've made

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.24.20  7:08 pm   Who/what inspired you to make the sort of content you make?

     i'm just trying to be ......... sensible
